SKT_FIRST.name: Securing the Culprit
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy and has a <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> chance to reduce the cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>The Culprit is You!</color> by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>15%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>【犯人はあなたです!】</color>のスキルターンを<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>減少させる。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>15%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>범인은 바로 당신!</color> 스킬의 쿨타임을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 감소시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人,并有<color=#28d9ed>15%</color>的几率使<color=#28d9ed>犯人就是你!</color>的技能冷却时间减少<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。

SKT_BURST_2.effect: Increases the chance to reduce cooldown by 80%
SKT_BURST_2.effect_jp: スキルターン減少の発生率+80%
SKT_BURST_2.effect_zh: 冷却时间减少触发几率+80%

SKT_BURST_3.effect: +3 turns increased Critical Damage on allies
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 会心ダメージUP+3ターン\n(味方全体)
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh: 友军暴击伤害提升+3回合

SKT_SECOND.name: Thinking Time
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Triggered Effect) When an ally uses an attack that targets all enemies, grants increased Attack to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>, and increases Priority of ally Mages by <color=#28d9ed>10%</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: (発動効果)味方が全体攻撃時、味方全体の攻撃力を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間UPさせ、魔法型の味方の行動ゲージを<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>UPさせる。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: (발동 효과) 아군이 전체 공격을 했을 때, 아군 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color>동안 공격력을 증가시키고, 아군의 마법형 캐릭터는 행동 게이지가 <color=#28d9ed>10%</color> 증가합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: (触发效果)友军发动全体攻击时,使全体友军攻击力提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>,并使友军中魔法型角色的行动值提升<color=#28d9ed>10%</color>。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: The Culprit is You!
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies without <color=#28d9ed>missing</color>, and grants increased Accuracy to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与え、味方全体の命中を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPさせる。このスキルは<color=#28d9ed>ミスヒット</color>しない。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 <color=#28d9ed>빗나감</color> 없이 공격하고, 아군 전체는 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 명중이 증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 攻击全体敌人,不会发生<color=#28d9ed>闪避</color>,并使全体友军的命中提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

3: +2 turns Increased Critical Hit Chance to all allies
3_jp: 味方全体の会心率+2ターン
3_zh: 全体友军暴击率提升+2回合

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to grant increased Attack to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>30%</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(トドメ)</color>:攻撃後、味方全体の攻撃力が<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPする。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、自分の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>UPさせる。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 피니시 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 아군 전체의 공격력이 증가합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>30%</color> 증가시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携收尾效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>的几率使全体友军的攻击力提升,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,使自身<color=#28d9ed>行动值</color>提升<color=#28d9ed>30%</color>。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%

5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
